name: AZ Rubik Solver - Magic Cube
description:
The Rubik's Cube challenges your mind and problem-solving skills.
It is incredibly addictive and has fascinated fans for decades.
A great mental challenge to solve at home or on the move, and now on your phone!.

Turn, twist and repeat – the FREE Rubik's Cube app lets you experience the classic puzzle in a completely new way on your phone!

These twisty puzzles help in developing concentration, logic, and patience.

Key Features:
* Realistic 3D graphics and animation
* Attractively colored Rubik's Cube
* Simple and handy controls
* Free cube rotation in all axis
* Helpful tutorial to solve Rubik's Cube
* Cube timer
* Record achievements and leaderboards. Share your time with the whole world!
* It's FREE!

Have fun solving these world-famous addictive puzzles!
